definition: historical tales
to speak/to explain/to negotiate/to emphasise/to be particular about/as far as sth is concerned/speech/lecture
surname Shi
history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China

sentences.english: Types existed in personage's image-building in the novels of the Ming and Qing Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 明清讲史小说在人物形象塑造上存在着类型化倾向。

sentences.english: Historical Pinghua has much bearing on the novel Romance of the Three Kingdoms.
sentences.chinese: 讲史平话与《三国演义》成书的关系十分密切。

sentences.english: Jiangshi Pinghua in Song and Yuan Dynasty literature has always been considered as the scripts of Jiangshi.
sentences.chinese: 宋元讲史平话一直被认为是讲史的话本。

sentences.english: Jiangshi Pinghua in Song and Yuan Dynasty literature has always been considered as the scripts of Jiangshi.
sentences.chinese: 宋元讲史平话一直被认为是讲史的话本。

sentences.english: Commercialization of Lecture on history had risen and came to bloom in the Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 在宋代，商业性讲史活动开始出现并日趋兴盛。

sentences.english: History-telling is an important genre in Chinese literature.
sentences.chinese: 讲史是我国历史上的一种重要文学艺术形式。

definition: folk art consisting of storytelling to music
pingshu, a folk art where a single performer narrates stories from history or fiction
storytelling dramatic art dating back to Song and Yuan periods, single narrator without music, often historical topics with commentary
Song and Yuan literary form based on vernacular folk stories

dramatic form consisting of historical narration/history as jocular narrative/to stretch history for a joking story/amusing story with strained interpretations of history/to make an unreasonable comparison in jest
novel in chapters, main format for long novels from the Ming onwards, with each chapter headed by a summary couplet
a Yuan dynasty form of musical comedy
historical biography
Stories Old and New by Feng Menglong 馮夢龍|冯梦龙[Feng2 Meng4 long2], collection of late Ming baihua 白話|白话[bai2 hua4] tales published in 1620
popular fiction/light literature
Sanxia wuyi (lit. Three knight-errants and five righteous one), novel edited from stories of late Qing dynasty pinghua 評話|评话 master storyteller Shi Yukun 石玉昆
ballad tune in southern dialects, usually to sanxian 三弦 or pipa 琵琶 accompaniment
to talk of the past and discuss the present (idiom)/to chat freely/to discuss everything
form of writing novels that comprise lots of poetry in the body of the text, popular in the Ming Dynasty
anecdote/lost or apocryphal story about famous person
History of the Five Dynasties, eighteenth of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], compiled under Xue Juzheng 薛居正[Xue1 Ju1 zheng4] in 974 during Northern Song 北宋[Bei3 Song4], 150 scrolls
